name: Adorable Assault
description:
A kingdom of darkness is invaded by a wave of cute creatures. The dark kingdom’s king will have to use his abilities to fight them off and reclaim his kingdom’s land in this 2.5D platformer.

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Level Design, Digital Art, Modeling, VFX
Viktor Briceno - Game Design, Level Design, Programming
Luis Boscan - Game Design, Level Design, Programming

Adorable Assault is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College class.
